issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: If I set  Ti.Geolocation.Android.manualMode to true and define only one Ti.Geolocation.Android.createLocationProvider and one Ti.Geolocation.Android.createLocationRule, the Android geolocation module returns "fused" even when device is in Airplane mode and only occasionally returns GPS results from my defined LocationProvider.
fields.summary: Ti.Geolocation.Android returns "fused" even when device in Airplane mode.
fields.environment: Android version 5.0.2 and later. My test phone in this case is a ZTE R84with Android security patch level 2016-06-01 Baseband version P816A20, Kernel version 3.10.49 kenerl@Zdroid.SMT, build number R84_M02
